text: St. Ignatius of Loyola College, Las Palmas, was founded by the Society of Jesus in 1917 and has grown to cover infant through baccalaureate and middle technical training. It is located on the Spanish Grand Canary Island of Las Palmas. The school is located in the old part of the city. It accommodates from first year of infant education through baccalaureate and Professional training of middle degree. ==References== Category:Jesuit secondary schools in Spain Category:Catholic schools in Spain Category:Secondary schools in Spain Category:Jesuit secondary schools Category:Educational institutions established in 1917
title: St. Ignatius of Loyola College, Las Palmas
